Key Match Events: Brayan Rocchio hit an RBI single in the 2nd inning
Angel Martinez scored a run in the 5th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians reduced their magic number to clinch the American League Central Division to 9 over the Royals
Cleveland also moved closer to securing a playoff spot, with a magic number of 4 (effectively 3) over Detroit and Seattle
Others: Ben Lively tossed five efficient innings
The Guardians bullpen backed Lively with four shutout frames
Emmanuel Clase picked up his league-leading 45th save
Cade Smith fanned Caminero on three pitches for the first out of the 6th inning
